about_the_game:
Hats!

I've made some hats.

Be avant garde in the avant garde as you play Flock of Dogs! Everyone along the banks of the Air River are talking about these fancy, new hats, which is a bit odd, however, because they have exactly zero effect on your chances of winning a minigame, defeating a monster, or reaching the Festival in time.

This set of 11 hats will cover the basic needs of every Dog Rider:
  • Ball Cap
  • Cereal Bowl Hat
  • Cowboy Hat
  • Bear Hat
  • Jester's Cap 'n Bells
  • Knight's Helm
  • Lamp Hat
  • Party Hat
  • Sombrero
  • Straw Hat
  • Tree Hat

Do you like my hats?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
